DataElement.preferredName: Clinical or Research Activity Clinical Study Activity Description java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol._A coded terminology representation of a study activity that can be planned, scheduled or performed according to the study protocol. A full representation includes a code and a corresponding textual description of the activity._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol._A coded terminology representation of a study activity that can be planned, scheduled or performed according to the study protocol. A full representation includes a code and a corresponding textual description of the activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

Concepts.definition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

Property.preferredDefinition: A coded terminology representation of a study activity that can be planned, scheduled or performed according to the study protocol. A full representation includes a code and a corresponding textual description of the activity.

Concepts.definition: A coded terminology representation of a study activity that can be planned, scheduled or performed according to the study protocol. A full representation includes a code and a corresponding textual description of the activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
